sentences.english: A good starting point is three parts mix to one part perlite.
sentences.chinese: 可以试试用三份介质加一份珍珠岩混合。

sentences.english: One popular planting mix combines one part potting soil with one part perlite.
sentences.chinese: 其中一部份结合流行的组合盆栽种植土一部分珍珠岩。

sentences.english: Water repellent for powers, fibres, perlite and expanded vermiculite.
sentences.chinese: 粉末，纤维，珍珠岩，膨胀的蛭石。

sentences.english: The colorant is one prepared by incorporating the above liquid reinforcement with a pigment and powdered perlite.
sentences.chinese: 着色剂以颜料及珍珠岩粉状混入基体补强剂中。

sentences.english: Specialists suggested that they use pearlite to improve the structure of the building.
sentences.chinese: 建议他们用珍珠岩改良建筑的结构。

sentences.english: If perlite is reused, sterilization may be necessary.
sentences.chinese: 如果珍珠岩是重复使用，消毒可能是必要的。

sentences.english: The surface of perlite particles is a function of the particle size distribution.
sentences.chinese: 表面珍珠岩颗粒是一种功能的粒径分布。

sentences.english: The inner subfacies of extrusive facies of subaqueous volcanic rocks are good reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 水下喷发火山岩中侵出相内带亚相珍珠岩为优质储层。

sentences.english: You will not be changing the basic design of the mix but do not overdo the perlite.
sentences.chinese: 你无需改变介质的基本配比，也不要加太多的珍珠岩。

sentences.english: Peat moss is well known for high porosity and perlite has a similar property.
sentences.chinese: 泥炭是众所周知的高孔隙度和珍珠岩也有类似的财产。

sentences.english: Perlite is a light-weight odorless, sterilized, heat-expanded volcanic mineral.
sentences.chinese: 珍珠岩是一种重量轻，无臭，消毒，热膨胀火山矿物。

definition: base solvent (of chemical compound)/stroma (framing biological tissue)
